plot: A ruthless hit man's path to destruction while surviving the mire of crime and corruption. Gunner and his brother Dom, a detective, may have to corroborate to solve Gunner's ex-girlfriend's murder. All hell breaks loose.
title: Gunner's Rift
plot_es: A ruthless hit man's path to destruction while surviving the mire of crime and corruption. Gunner and his brother Dom, a detective, may have to corroborate to solve Gunner's ex-girlfriend's murder. All hell breaks loose.
plot_en: A ruthless hit man's path to destruction while surviving the mire of crime and corruption. Gunner and his brother Dom, a detective, may have to corroborate to solve Gunner's ex-girlfriend's murder. All hell breaks loose.
